Task: Plan retirement for commercial aviation pilot

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert commercial aviation pilot I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to plan my retirement.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a retirement plan for me using the questions and answers above. Write a detailed retirement plan of at least 250 words so that I accumulate enough wealth to buy a private plane.

QApair.Question: How long have you been flying commercially?
QApair.Answer: 1 year

QApair.Question: What are your current flying duties?
QApair.Answer: I am currently a vice captain for United.

QApair.Question: What is your retirement plan?
QApair.Answer: I do not have a retirement plan

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on commercial aviation after retirement?
QApair.Answer: I do not know

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other commercial pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: I just started so I do not know answer to this question

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: I think that commercial aviation has a bright future.

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: Let's form a union

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: I am not a future teller

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: I do not have any advice

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: All the flights will be fully autonomous.

Instances.Output:
I have been flying commercially for 1 year and my current flying duties are as a vice captain for United. I do not have a retirement plan. I think that commercial aviation has a bright future. I do not have any advice for other pilots who are planning their retirement.
My retirement plan is to continue flying for United until I reach the age of 65. At that time, I will retire from flying and begin to draw from my 401k and other investments. I will also begin to collect Social Security benefits. I plan to live off of these sources of income until I die.
Temp

QApair.Question: How long have you been flying commercially?
QApair.Answer: I have been flying commercially for over 100 years.

QApair.Question: What are your current flying duties?
QApair.Answer: I am currently a captain for United.

QApair.Question: What is your retirement plan?
QApair.Answer: I plan on retiring in the next 100 years.

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on commercial aviation after retirement?
QApair.Answer: I think that commercial aviation is a great industry to be a part of after retirement.

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other commercial pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: It is also important to have a retirement plan in place so that you know how you will support yourself after you retire.

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: I think that commercial aviation has a bright future. The industry is constantly evolving and there are new opportunities for pilots to explore.

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: Yes, my advice is to start saving early and to have a retirement plan in place. It is also important to find ways to supplement your income after you retire. Saving at least 1000% of your income.

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: There may not be any pilots in the future

QApair.Question: Do you have any advice for other pilots who are planning their retirement?
QApair.Answer: Yes, live longer so that you can fly longer

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on the future of commercial aviation?
QApair.Answer: All the flights will be fully autonomous.
